title: Advanced Landing Page Template
description: This is a feature-rich advanced Landing Page template built with advanced components, providing more features and configuration options, perfect for commercial projects that need professional appearance and rich interactive effects.

richFeatures.title: Rich Features
richFeatures.description: Provides more configuration options and interactive features to meet complex requirements

visualEffects.title: Visual Effects
visualEffects.description: Includes animations, gradients and other visual effects to enhance user experience

flexibleConfig.title: Flexible Configuration
flexibleConfig.description: Supports multiple layout and style configurations to adapt to different scenarios
